org.apache.xmlbeans

Interface XmlIDREF

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XmlAnySimpleType, XmlName, XmlNCName, XmlNormalizedString, XmlObject, XmlString, XmlToken, XmlTokenSource

    public interface XmlIDREF
extends XmlNCName
    Corresponds to the XML Schema xs:IDREF type.

    When validated, IDREF values must match an ID value that is present within the document. This rule is only verified when a whole document is validated at once.

    Convertible to a String.

      A class with methods for creating instances of XmlIDREF.
